name: Hot Edge
description:
Add a hot edge that activates the overview. The hot edge can be added to the left, bottom or right side of the screen. On multi-monitor configurations, one hot edge is added to the primary monitor only.

You can find more documentation at https://github.com/mikejturner/hotedge/blob/main/README.md and report issues at https://github.com/mikejturner/hotedge/issues .
